DockWidth.description: Width of the dock in feet. Typically 9

DockHeight.description: Height of the dock in feet. Typically 13

CenterToCenterDockSpacing.description: Space between the center of each dock in feet. Typically 13

DepthOfLevelerPit_Ft.description: Depth of the leveler pit in feet. Typically -1

DockDepth_Ft.description: Depth of the dock in feet. Typically -4
